entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mechanism to track source generators contributing to assembly #67663
  • `IGeneratorContext.AddSource` throws ArgumentException wrongly claiming invalid filename on linux #67653
  • IDE0045 goves a false positive #67649
  • Extracting method after confirmations does nothing #67647
    Backlog

Closed

  • `IDE0059` is not fired for property pattern assignment #66573
    Backlog
  • Remove optional parameters from IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #67434

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix message in make struct member readonly analyzer #67664
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations due to StateSet enumerations of project/activefile states. #67662
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Store parameter locations as a OneOrMany #67661
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not allocate location arrays when determining if a symbol is within a tree #67659
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #67658
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay create AliasesAndUsings data until needed #67655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add info to let named types quickly return 'null' when they have no primary constructor #67652
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve performance if testing if a trivia is strutured trivia or not. #67651
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce the size/cost of explicit enum symbols #67657
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache assembly qualified names as they're expensive to compute #67656
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix publishdata to create non-draft PRs for main #67654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix semantic tokens refresh queue to send requests #67646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix for FixAll in project and solution scopes for non-C#/VB projects #67650
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Upgrade to latest RoslynDiagnosticsNugetPackageVersion #67648
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove optional parameters from IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #67635
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, untriaged, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] AnalyzerDriver performance improvements #67591
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance, untriaged, Next
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.6] Cache source generator node tables only if their state counts match #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
